title: Saffron for the Treatment of PMS | NutritionFacts.org
author: Michael Greger M D FACLM
description: The spice saffron appears to improve both the emotional and physical symptoms of premenstrual syndrome.
cleaned_text: The spice saffron appears to improve both the emotional and physical symptoms of premenstrual syndrome. Saffron for the Treatment of PMS Doctor's Note Remember saffron, from my videos [Saffron for the Treatment of Alzheimer's](https://nutritionfacts.org/video/saffron-for-the-treatment-of-alzheimers/) and [Saffron vs. Aricept](https://nutritionfacts.org/video/saffron-versus-aricept/)? See my blog post, [Natural Alzheimer's Treatment](https://nutritionfacts.org/2011/09/06/natural-alzheimers-treatment/), for more context, as well as my post on other natural remedies: [Amla: Indian gooseberries vs. cancer, diabetes, and cholesterol](https://nutritionfacts.org/2012/01/17/amla-indian-gooseberries-versus-cancer-diabetes-and-cholesterol/). I also have dozens of [other videos on women's health](https://nutritionfacts.org/topics/womens-health/). This is the first of a three-part video series on the latest on this powerful spice (also see [Power Plants](https://nutritionfacts.org/video/power-plants/)). Next, [Wake Up and Smell the Saffron](https://nutritionfacts.org/video/wake-up-and-smell-the-saffron/) is even more unbelievable. Finally, I wrap up with a head-to-head comparison: [Saffron vs. Prozac](https://nutritionfacts.org/video/saffron-vs-prozac/). For additional context, check out my associated blog posts: [ Treating PMS with Saffron]( https://nutritionfacts.org/2013/03/07/treating-pms-with-saffron/); Pain with Diet](https://nutritionfacts.org/2013/11/07/treating-breast-pain-with-diet/).
